body_html:
This is usually due to GitHub's hash change, and you not downloading from mirror.bazel.build successfully (therefore falling back to GitHub and picking up the changed hash):

$ wget -q -O - http://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/9aafb854cc7cb8df8338c50cb411a54ce1e09796.tar.gz | sha256sum
2a6d4c23f6660d9130d8d5f16267db53a87f8d0104f9618b558c033570f110af  -
$ wget -q -O - http://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/9aafb854cc7cb8df8338c50cb411a54ce1e09796.tar.gz | sha256sum
e8f07137a3a0b95e143c0665cd19160dd5040114b34a48653fa7f5f91cf4c136  -

See also #12986, #13080 (and unreported, LLVM itself in prior versions like the release 1.3.0 where mirror.bazel.build fails with HTTP 403).

See also #12986, #13080 (and unreported, LLVM itself in prior versions like the release 1.3.0 where mirror.bazel.build fails with HTTP 403).
body:
This is usually due to GitHub's hash change, and you not downloading from mirror.bazel.build successfully (therefore falling back to GitHub and picking up the changed hash):

```
$ wget -q -O - http://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/9aafb854cc7cb8df8338c50cb411a54ce1e09796.tar.gz | sha256sum
2a6d4c23f6660d9130d8d5f16267db53a87f8d0104f9618b558c033570f110af  -
$ wget -q -O - http://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/9aafb854cc7cb8df8338c50cb411a54ce1e09796.tar.gz | sha256sum
e8f07137a3a0b95e143c0665cd19160dd5040114b34a48653fa7f5f91cf4c136  -
```

See also #12986, #13080 (and unreported, LLVM itself in prior versions like the release 1.3.0 where mirror.bazel.build fails with HTTP 403).
